meanings.definition: To surpass in shining or brightness.
meanings.sent1: The sun outshined the stars in the sky.
meanings.sent2: Her smile outshined all the other smiles in the room.
meanings.sent3: The flashlight outshined the glow-in-the-dark toy.
meanings.sent4: His talent outshined the competition like a beacon of light.
meanings.sent5: The diamond outshined all the other gems with its brilliance.

meanings.definition: To surpass in excellence or achievement.
meanings.sent1: She outshined her classmates in the spelling bee.
meanings.sent2: Their teamwork outshined all other teams in the tournament.
meanings.sent3: The student outshined the teacher in solving the math problem.
meanings.sent4: His dedication outshined all obstacles in his path to success.
meanings.sent5: The champion outshined all competitors with their remarkable skills.
